description: Reports the first occurance of detection of a DHCP client that
changed interfaces.

event.Summary: DHCP client (MAC: $v2) changed interface and detected by $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerDuplicateClient JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerMacAddress s EXAMPL JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerLastDetected s EXAMPLEE

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName

description: The MAC address of the client that changed interfaces.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerMacAddress

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName

description: The time the duplicate client was last detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerLastDetected

description: Reports when the limit of clients has been exceeded on an interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on interface $v2 exceeded the limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimitExceeded JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimit u 9999

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimit

description: Reports when the number of clients on an interface has fallen
below the limit allowed on that interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on interface $v2 is below the maximum limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimitAbated JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimit u 9999

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerInterfaceLimit

description: Reports when a health event occurs in the Local Server
application.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerHealth JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerEventSeverity i 0 JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerEventString s EXAMPLE

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRouterName

description: The level of error.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerEventSeverity

description: The text of the event string associated with the health event.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpLocalServerEventString

description: Reports when the limit of clients has been exceeded on an interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on interface $v2 exceeded the limit $v3

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayRouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayInterfaceLimit

description: Reports when the number of clients on an interface has fallen
below the limit allowed on that interface.

event.Summary: Number of clients on $v2 is below the maximum limit $v3

description: The VRF ID in JUNOS. Represented as the Logical Router (LR)
Name followed by the Router Instance (RI) Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayRouterName

description: The interface where the DHCP client was detected
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayInterfaceName

description: The number of clients supported on this interface.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JDHCP-MIB::jnxJdhcpRelayInterfaceLimit
